sn46.11:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ye keci pana cattaro iriyapathe kappenti—
sn46.11:1.2: kalena gamanam, kalena thanam, kalena nisajjam, kalena seyyam, sabbe te pathavim nissaya pathaviyam patitthaya evamete cattaro iriyapathe kappenti;
sn46.11:1.3: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silam nissaya sile patitthaya satta bojjhange bhaveti, satta bojjhange bahulikaroti.
sn46.11:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silam nissaya sile patitthaya satta bojjhange bhaveti satta bojjhange bahulikaroti?
sn46.11:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim …pe…
sn46.11:2.3: upekkhasambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn46.11:2.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silam nissaya sile patitthaya satta bojjhange bhaveti, satta bojjhange bahulikaroti”ti.
